item.title: Dark Auction extended demo now available for PC, launches January 28 for PS5
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Play through to the end of Chapter 1.

Publisher Good Smile Company, and publisher and developer IzanagiGames have released an extended demo for the PC version of mystery adventure game Dark Auction via Steam. A PlayStation 5 version of the demo will follow on January 28.

The demo, which was previously only available up to the end of the prologue, is now playable through to the end of Chapter 1, including the previously shrouded-in-mystery auction part, totaling for about three hours of gameplay.

Dark Auction is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on January 29.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/dark-auction-extended-demo-now-available-for-pc-launches-january-28-for-ps5
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Famitsu Sales: 1/12/26 – 1/18/26
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Animal Crossing: New Horizons - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition debuts at 31,372 retail copies sold.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of January 12, 2026 to January 18, 2026.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition was the highest selling new release of the week, debuting at 31,372 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 67,509 units, the Switch family sold 27,234 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 9,983 units, the Xbox Series family sold 303 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 10 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [SW2] Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Nintendo, 01/15/26) – 31,372 (New)
  2. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) – 17,639 (2,778,889)
  3. [NSW] Pokemon Legends: Z-A (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 9,990 (1,587,653)
  4. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 9,047 (8,343,109)
  5. [SW2] Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 8,560 (1,065,074)
  6. [SW2] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Konami, 11/13/25) – 8,415 (249,798)
  7. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu 2: Anata no Machi mo Kitto Aru – Higashi Nihon Hen + Nishi Nihon Hen (Konami, 11/13/25) – 8,070 (302,212)
  8. [SW2] Kirby Air Riders (Nintendo, 11/20/25) – 7,942 (480,491)
  9. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,465 (4,133,500)
  10. [SW2] Donkey Kong Bananza (Nintendo, 07/17/25) – 4,966 (465,146)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on January 23.

  1. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) –
  2. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) –
  3. [SW2] Super Mario Party Jamboree – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV (Nintendo, 07/24/25) –
  4. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  5. [SW2] Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment (Koei Tecmo, 11/06/25) –
  6. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  7. [NSW] Ring Fit Adventure (Nintendo, 10/18/19) –
  8. [NSW] Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 (Nintendo, 10/02/25) –
  9. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –
  10. [NSW] Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 10/30/25) –
  11. [NSW] Tamagotchi Plaza (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) –
  12. [SW2] Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 10/30/25) –
  13. [SW2] Tamagotchi Plaza – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Bandai Namco, 06/26/25) –
  14. [NSW] Splatoon 3 (Nintend0, 09/09/22) –
  15. [NSW] Run for Money: Hunters vs. Runners! Can You Win as Either? (D3 Publisher, 12/04/25) –
  16. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  17. [PS5] Ghost of Yotei (SIE, 10/02/25) –
  18. [NSW] Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 (Aniplex, 08/01/25) –
  19. [SW2] The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (Nintendo, 06/05/25) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch 2 – 67,509 (4,165,414)
  2. Switch Lite – 12,686 (6,835,611)
  3. Switch OLED Model – 8,631 (9,423,469)
  4. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 6,358 (1,160,742)
  5. Switch – 5,917 (20,230,657)
  6. PlayStation 5 – 2,378 (5,877,836)
  7. PlayStation 5 Pro – 1,247 (316,368)
  8. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 230 (25,090)
  9. Xbox Series S – 50 (340,514)
  10. Xbox Series X – 23 (323,907)
  11. PlayStation 4 – 10 (7,930,186)
